beers.description: Cacao Pod Juice Milkshake IPA double dry hopped with Citra and conditioned with a ridiculous amount of extra Madagascar vanilla beans.
beers.summary: Cacao Pod Juice Milkshake IPA double dry hopped with Citra and conditioned with a ridiculous amount of extra Madagascar vanilla beans.

beers.notes: Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.
beers.description: Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #20. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
beers.summary:
Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #20. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.

beers.notes: Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.
beers.description: Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
beers.summary:
Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.

beers.notes: Notes of cotton candy, fruit punch, pink starburst, and 666 years of happiness.
beers.description: Mixed Fruit Anniversary Double Milkshake IPA 9.5% The anniversary celebration of our Culinary IPA series. Brewed with gobs of oats, and lactose sugar. Conditioned atop of luscious Madagascar vanilla beans, passionfruit, pineapple, lime, grapefruit, guava, and tangerine puree. Intensely hopped and then dry hopped with Mosaic and Citra. Dreamt up with our sweet pals at Omnipollo.
beers.summary:
Mixed Fruit Anniversary Double Milkshake IPA 9.5% The anniversary celebration of our Culinary IPA series. Brewed with gobs of oats, and lactose sugar. Conditioned atop of luscious Madagascar vanilla beans, passionfruit, pineapple, lime, grapefruit, guava, and tangerine puree. Intensely hopped and then dry hopped with Mosaic and Citra. Dreamt up with our sweet pals at Omnipollo.
Notes of cotton candy, fruit punch, pink starburst, and 666 years of happiness.

beers.notes: Notes of vanilla fudge, starfruit, Charleston chew, and Gewurztraminer.
beers.description: Milkshake IPA 7.2% Our latest heavily amplified psychedelic riff on THE boundary-pushing Culinary IPA series. Brewed with gobs of oats, and lactose sugar. Conditioned atop of luscious Madagascar vanilla beans, and fresh cacao pod juice. Intensely hopped and dry hopped with Mosaic and Citra. Dreamt up in tandem with our sweet angel life mates at Omnipollo from Sweden.
beers.summary:
Milkshake IPA 7.2% Our latest heavily amplified psychedelic riff on THE boundary-pushing Culinary IPA series. Brewed with gobs of oats, and lactose sugar. Conditioned atop of luscious Madagascar vanilla beans, and fresh cacao pod juice. Intensely hopped and dry hopped with Mosaic and Citra. Dreamt up in tandem with our sweet angel life mates at Omnipollo from Sweden.
Notes of vanilla fudge, starfruit, Charleston chew, and Gewurztraminer.

beers.notes: Notes of lush mango, pine sap, candied grapefruit, mango jelly, and earth.
beers.description: Mango IPA. 7.0% Brewed with red wheat. Hopped and dry hopped intensely and singularly with the almighty Simcoe. Conditioned atop big juicy heaps of ripe mango lovingly processed in house.
beers.summary:
Mango IPA. 7.0% Brewed with red wheat. Hopped and dry hopped intensely and singularly with the almighty Simcoe. Conditioned atop big juicy heaps of ripe mango lovingly processed in house.
Notes of lush mango, pine sap, candied grapefruit, mango jelly, and earth.

beers.notes: Notes of strawberry water ice, wildflower bouquet, and a picnic blanket.
beers.description: Strawberry Saison 4.7% Brewed entirely with Pilsner malt. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Mosaic, Hibiscus and Rose petals. Fermented and conditioned for many moons on top of strawberry puree. Brewed with our friend Nels Cline.
beers.summary:
Strawberry Saison 4.7% Brewed entirely with Pilsner malt. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Mosaic, Hibiscus and Rose petals. Fermented and conditioned for many moons on top of strawberry puree. Brewed with our friend Nels Cline.
Notes of strawberry water ice, wildflower bouquet, and a picnic blanket.

beers.notes: Notes of citrus rind, sage, soft  cereal grains, and light tropical musk.
beers.beer: The Light That Spills Out of the Hole in Your Head
beers.description: Clementine IPA. 5.9% Brewed with oats and an abundance of house processed clementine zest and juice. Dry hopped with Nelson Sauvin and Amarillo. A throwback to an early BrewCafe favorite.
beers.summary:
Clementine IPA. 5.9% Brewed with oats and an abundance of house processed clementine zest and juice. Dry hopped with Nelson Sauvin and Amarillo. A throwback to an early BrewCafe favorite.
Notes of citrus rind, sage, soft  cereal grains, and light tropical musk.

beers.notes: Notes of apricot, overripe peach, truffle oil, Gamay must, and the forest floor.
beers.description: Oak Fermented Saison du Earth. 8.8% Brewed with a plethora of specialty malts as well as 20 loaves of our house baked bread, PA Grade B maple syrup, lactose, chanterelles, and toasted sunflower seeds. Fermented & conditioned in some of our most expressive oak wine barrels for many moons with our Emptiness saison yeast strain.
beers.summary:
Oak Fermented Saison du Earth. 8.8% Brewed with a plethora of specialty malts as well as 20 loaves of our house baked bread, PA Grade B maple syrup, lactose, chanterelles, and toasted sunflower seeds. Fermented & conditioned in some of our most expressive oak wine barrels for many moons with our Emptiness saison yeast strain.
Notes of apricot, overripe peach, truffle oil, Gamay must, and the forest floor.
